brief.content-text: The diagram depicts the basic operation of DUAL. R1, R2, and R3 are connected in a triangular topology. R2 sends an update alerting its neighbors that a network is down. R1 and R2 respond with an acknowledgment. R2 sends a request asking for another route to the network that is down. R1 and R3 acknowledge the request and then reply that there is no other known route. The network remains unreachable
